hero.title: Discover the Healing Power of Sound
hero.subtitle: Transform your mind, body, and spirit with our carefully curated collection of sound healing instruments.
hero.description: Experience the transformative power of sound with our unique selection of instruments designed for relaxation, focus, and well-being.

products.title: Sound Healing Instruments
products.subtitle: Discover our carefully curated collection of premium sound healing instruments. Each piece is crafted to bring harmony, peace, and therapeutic vibrations to your life.
products.noResultsText: Try adjusting your filters or search terms to find the perfect instrument.

cart.title: Shopping Cart
cart.addedDescription: {{title}} has been added to your cart.

about.title: About Marcus Weber
about.intro1: Marcus Weber is dedicated to bringing the healing power of sound to everyone. With years of experience in sound therapy, he curates instruments that inspire relaxation and well-being.
about.intro2: Our mission is to help you discover the transformative effects of sound, whether you are a beginner or an experienced practitioner.
about.missionText: We strive to provide high-quality sound healing instruments and resources to support your journey towards balance and harmony.

faqItems.chooseInstrument: How do I choose the right instrument?
faqItems.benefits: What are the benefits of sound therapy?

faqAnswers.soundHealing: Sound healing is a practice that uses vibrations from instruments to promote physical and emotional well-being.
faqAnswers.chooseInstrument: Consider your intention and personal preference. We are happy to guide you in finding the perfect instrument.
faqAnswers.workshops: Yes, we offer workshops for all levels. Check our events page for upcoming sessions.
faqAnswers.benefits: Sound therapy can help reduce stress, improve focus, and support overall health.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.subtitle: Have questions about our sound healing instruments? We'd love to hear from you. Send us an email and we'll respond as soon as possible.
contact.emailPrompt: Click the button below to send us an email. We'll get back to you as soon as possible.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.subtitle: General Terms and Conditions
privacy.description: Our comprehensive privacy policy outlines how MEINL Sonic Energy collects, uses, and protects your personal information. We are committed to maintaining the highest standards of privacy protection and transparency.

coveredItems.rights: Your rights and choices regarding your data

summaryItems.noSelling: Your data is never sold to third parties
summaryItems.deletion: You can request data deletion at any time
summaryItems.encryption: All data is encrypted and securely stored

updates.v21Description: Updated data retention policies and enhanced security measures
updates.v20Description: Added CCPA compliance and improved cookie management
updates.v15Description: Enhanced GDPR compliance and user rights clarification

privacy.dpoDescription: Our Data Protection Officer is available to help with any privacy-related questions or concerns.

contactDetails.mail: Mail: Privacy Officer, 123 Sound Street, Harmony City

responseDetails.inquiry: We respond to privacy inquiries within 72 hours

shipping.title: Shipping Information
shipping.expressDescription: Fast delivery when you need it

zones.zone1Countries: Austria, Belgium, France, Germany, Netherlands, Luxembourg
zones.zone2Countries: Italy, Spain, Portugal, Poland, Czech Republic, Slovakia, Hungary
zones.zone3Countries: United Kingdom, Switzerland, Norway, USA, Canada

packaging.wrapping: Each instrument is carefully wrapped in protective material
packaging.foam: Custom foam inserts for delicate items
packaging.boxes: Sturdy cardboard boxes designed for musical instruments
packaging.labels: Fragile handling labels on all packages

protection.insuranceDescription: All shipments are automatically insured up to their full value at no extra cost to you.
protection.guaranteeDescription: We guarantee safe delivery or your money back.

returns.description: We want you to be completely satisfied with your purchase. If you're not happy with your sound healing instrument, we offer:
returns.condition: Items must be in original condition
returns.freeReturn: Free return shipping for defective items
returns.label: Receive prepaid return label

help.description: Have questions about shipping or need to track your order?

footer.aboutText: MEINL Sonic Energy offers high-quality sound therapy instruments for meditation, relaxation, and sound healing.
